snippet: Spain’s financial struggles, and the perception that Germany may be partly to blame, have added to a nascent anti-euro-zone sentiment among Spaniards.
abstract: Spain’s financial struggles, and the perception that Germany may be partly to blame, have added to a nascent anti-euro-zone sentiment among Spaniards.
lead_paragraph: Spain’s financial struggles, and the perception that Germany may be partly to blame, have added to a nascent anti-euro-zone sentiment among Spaniards.

headline.seo: Some in Spain Blame Germany for Bailout’s Delay
